fullDescription.intro: This node allows you to read flat ascii files and create a document for each file. The documents title will be the first sentence of the file and the full text the remaining text contained in the file. The specified directory will be searched for all files, if recursive search is activated the subdirectories are going to be searched too. All contained files are parsed. The document data is stored in the outgoing data table.
fullDescription.option: Set the directory containing the files to parse.
If checked, the specified directory is searched for files recursively.
If checked, hidden files will not be considered for parsing.
Specifies the category of the documents.
Specifies the source of the documents.
Specifies the type of the documents.

ports.outPort: An output table containing the parsed document data.
